    • Method Detail

      • getLatch

        public static com.elevenpaths.latch.Latch getLatch()
        This method returns a Latch instance for a given Latch application by appId and secretKey. It takes this values from main project application.conf - latch.appId: Latch application id - latch.secretKey: Latch application secret key
        Returns:
        A Latch instance for the appId

      • checkLatchStatus

        public static java.lang.String checkLatchStatus(java.lang.String appId,
                                                java.lang.String accountId)
        This method check the status for a Latch application with a specific user
        Parameters:
        appId - A latch application id
        accountId - A latched user accountId
        Returns:
        A String with "on" in case user with accountId allows this app or "off" if not

      • checkLatchOperationStatus

        public static java.lang.String checkLatchOperationStatus(java.lang.String operationId,
                                                         java.lang.String accountId)
        This method check the status for a Latch operation with a specific user
        Parameters:
        operationId - A latch operation id
        accountId - A latched user accountId
        Returns:
        A String with "on" in case user with accountId allows this operation or "off" if not

      • pair

        public static java.lang.String pair(java.lang.String pairingKey)
        Handle the pairing action
        Parameters:
        pairingKey - The pairing key given by user to pair this app with its Latch account
        Returns:
        A String with accountId if successfully paired or null if not

      • unpair

        public static java.lang.String unpair(java.lang.String accountId)
        Handle the unpairing action
        Parameters:
        accountId - String value with the accountId returned for that user in a previous pairing operation
        Returns:
        String "ok if unpairing was ok or null if not"
